subject: Suits and Litigation
Football
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the former St. Louis Rams player Willie Gary and three fans plan to withdraw a lawsuit that accuses the Patriots of cheating in the 2002 Super Bowl. The plaintiffs’ lawyers say they sued last month to secure sworn testimony from the former Patriots employee Matt Walsh, who might have taped a walk-through practice by the Rams before New England’s Super Bowl victory. But the lawyers call it an “exercise in futility” because they suspect Walsh would exercise his constitutional right against self-incrimination.
